pageProduct.name: Skin Republic Gold Hydrogel Mask
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Hydrogel facial sheet mask infused with 25K Gold instantly reduces the signs of aging for lifted, smooth and younger looking skin.

  • Reduces signs of aging
  • Instantly minimise fine lines and wrinkles
  • Promotes firmer, younger looking skin

Instantly minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles with this luxurious Hydrogel serum sheet mask rich in antioxidants. Age-defying Minerals and Plant Extracts help reduce the visible signs of aging for lifted, smooth and younger looking skin.

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ceratonia Siliqua Gum, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Cellulose Gum, Polyacrylate-13, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Polyisobutene, Polysorbate 20, CI 77491, Adenosine, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Aspalathus Linearis Extract, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Flower Extract, Rosa Rugosa Flower Extract, Paeonia Albiflora Flower Extract, Gold, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol.

Directions

Cleanse skin, remove mask from packaging. There are two sections of the mask. Remove thin tissue backing from mask and discard. Place hydrogel mask on face with firm backing paper still in place. Position correctly and carefully remove firm backing paper. Wear for 30-40 minutes. Remove mask, do not rinse. Excess serum can be applied to neck, décolletage and hands.
